芼，mào,máo，本指可供食用的野菜或水草。
芼, mào, máo, originally refers to edible wild vegetables or aquatic plants.

芼字的基本解释

芼
máo
可供食用的水草或野菜：芼羹（用菜杂肉为羹）。
草覆地蔓延。

芼
mào
扫取，拔：“参差荇菜，左右芼之”。

芼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mào］
［《廣韻》莫報切，去号，明。］
［《廣韻》莫袍切，平豪，明。］
(1)择取。
(2)杂；拌和。
(3)通“毛”。草。指可供食用的野菜或水草。

芼字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　芼； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1021第11
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?莫報切，音耄。【說文】草覆蔓也。　又【爾雅·釋言】芼，搴也。【註】皆擇菜也。　又【五音集韻】武道切，音媢。用菜雜肉爲羹也。【禮·內則】芼羹。【疏】芼菜者，按《公食大夫禮》三牲皆有芼，牛藿、羊苦、豕薇也。又【韻會】謨袍切，音毛。【柳宗元詩】野蔬盈傾筐，頗雜池沼芼。【註】芼，草也。　又音莫。【詩·周南】左右芼之。叶下樂韻。

芼字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
芼字的起名意思

暂无。

vegetables
Basic explanation of words
vegetables
máo
Edible aquatic plants or wild vegetables: glutinous rice soup (use vegetable mixed meat as soup).
The grass covered the ground.
vegetables
mào
Sweeping, pulling: "Staggered Nymphoides, left and right."
vegetables
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mào］
["Guang Yun" don't report to cut, go to the number, Ming. ]
["Guangyun" Mo Paoqie, Pinghao, Ming. ]
(1) Select and take.
(2) Miscellaneous; mixing.
(3) Through "Mao". grass. Refers to edible wild vegetables or aquatic plants.
vegetables
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Chinese characters] 　芼; Kangxi strokes: 10; Page number: page 1021 to 11
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? Do not report to cut, the sound is old. [Said the text] The grass is covered with vines.　【Erya·Interpretation】芼，搴也。 [Note] Choose dishes.　[Five Yinji Yun] Wudao cut, sound girl. Use mixed vegetables for soup. 【Li · Nei Ze】Geng Geng. [Sparse] For those who have genus vegetables, according to the "Public Food Doctor's Ceremony", all three animals have genus, such as oxen, sheep bitter, and hogweed. [Yunhui] Mo robe cut, sound hair. 【Liu Zongyuan Poems】The wild vegetables are full of baskets, which are quite mixed with ponds and bogs. [Note] 芼, grass also.　Yinmo again. 【Poetry·Zhou Nan】Left and right. Yexia music rhyme.

mào, máo
I mào гл.
1)* собирать, отбирать
左右芼之 и слева, и справа собираем мы их (водяные растения)
2) вырастать, расстилаться по земле (о растительности)
II máo сущ.
травы; овощи
池沼芼 съедобные водяные растения
